subject: United States Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Melanie Oudin, who reached the quarterfinals of the United States Open in 2009 at age 17, is training at the United States Tennis Association’s center in Queens to help regain her winning form.
snippet: Melanie Oudin, who reached the quarterfinals of the United States Open in 2009 at age 17, is training at the United States Tennis Association’s center in Queens to help regain her winning form.
